original_title: Sri Lankan President discusses digitisation with Commonwealth Sec. General
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe met the Commonwealth Secretary-General, Patricia Scotland, during his visit to the U.K.
The President and the Secretary-General had discussed the digitisation programs within the Commonwealth.
President Wickremesinghe also shared his strategies for addressing climate change & explored the potential involvement of the Commonwealth in these efforts, said the President's Media Division.
